alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Frontier; Hayes; Lincoln; Logan; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 10:48AM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central, southwest and west central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cherry; Frontier; Hayes; Lincoln; Logan; Thomas
